text: Penicillium inflatum (also named Aspergillus inflatum) is an anamorph species of the genus of Penicillium which produces sterigmatocystin.ATCCUniProt It is from the Cremei section. ==Growth and morphology== A. inflatus has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_inflatus_cya.png|Penicillium inflatus growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_inflatus_meaox.png|Penicillium inflatus growing on MEAOX plate ==Further reading== * * ==References== inflatum Category:Fungi described in 1971
title: Penicillium inflatum
